title.rendered: Helderberg Training Society Rensburg Application 2025 | Apply Now

content.rendered:
Helderberg Training Society Rensburg Application 2025, How to register online for Helderberg Training Society Rensburg 2025,  Helderberg Training Society Rensburg courses, Fees, Prospectus

 

An online admission application and registration form/dates for the 2025 academic year have been released by the management of the Helderberg Training Society Rensburg.

Helderberg Training Society Rensburg online application ongoing;

  • First-time applicants to Helderberg Training Society Rensburg
  • New qualifications and/or specializations for students
  • Candidates who applied for admission but were not offered a space or who were offered a space and took it but did not register
  • A student who completes a higher certificate or any other programme and wishes to continue with further undergraduate studies

How to Register Online for Helderberg Training Society Rensburg Application 2025

For Helderberg Training Society Rensburg Online Registration, you will need the following items:

  • A valid email account
  • The South Africa identification number
  • Students from abroad need a passport

Please CLICK HERE to register for Helderberg Training Society Rensburg 2025

Apply Now.
